ygData.subject: Re: Getting Cash
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Where are you? North Ro is perfect for that level. You can take blue Tarentulas easy (they all have a Chitin that sells for a few silver, but half have one
ygData.messageBody:
According to Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Pierson:
> I don't know about others, but I haven't found a ready source for cash that I can
> survive hunting. I generally hunt with a similar level warrior. By scrimping and saving
> tho I have gotten a full set of cloth armor and most of my level 8 spells. Currently am
> level 10. Now begins the scrimping and saving to get level 12 spells. I know that

Where are you? North Ro is perfect for that level. You can take blue Tarentulas easy
(they all have a Chitin that sells for a few silver, but half have one or more Spider
Silk that sells for 1g7). At level 10, you can even take some Sand Scarabs with a
marginal luck (no fizzle), and those Scarabs have shells that sell for 1g2, and the
occasional Scarab Egg Sac that sells for 4g. Plus there's a guard to run to if you
get in over your head :)

In a two-hour hunting session, I usually make almost a plat. Granted, the last two
days were bad, because many people came in for the Tunare Festival, and the hunting
groups have swelled in number. When you see a Tarentula, you run fast, and /con later :)

--
